meanings.definition: A picture or design made using paint
meanings.sent1: I love looking at the beautiful paintings in the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: She hung up her new paintings on the wall of her room.
meanings.sent3: The paintings on the wall seemed to come alive and start talking!
meanings.sent4: His words were like colorful paintings that painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's paintings were so realistic, they almost looked like photographs.

meanings.definition: The act or art of applying paint to a surface
meanings.sent1: Her paintings on the canvas were full of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: He learned the technique of oil paintings from a famous artist.
meanings.sent3: The messy paintings on his hands showed he had been working hard.
meanings.sent4: The painter's skillful paintings transformed the plain wall into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The delicate paintings on the delicate china plates were truly impressive.
